Companies we work with

We offer recruiting services (hiring dedicated staff) in Digital Marketing from our offices in Ukraine.
Work in your time zone, full time (8 hours per day) or part-time (4 hours per day) and are waiting to meet you at the interview. All our candidates are already working for us for at least several months. They are reliable, we have fast internet and modern laptops for day to day work. Please find below the resumes of available candidates who are ready to work with you now.

Choose remote Staff in different categories

Design

Making web and app design, logos, banners, posts, videos, print and photo retouching according to the last trends

Development

Website maintenance or creating it from scratch by BackEnds and FrontEnds using templates and self coding

Marketing

A one-stop solution for all your marketing needs optimizing business goals and target audience for a website and social media channels

Sales

Achieving growth and hitting sales targets, designing and implementing a strategic sales plan that expands the company's customer base

Media

Developing and implementing all targeted content for various media platforms and delivering public relations and communications plans

Virtual assistance

Labor market research, correspondence with clients, setting meetings and maintaining schedule, bookkeeping & accounting

Lead Generation

LinkedIn, Facebook, email marketing, searching for your targeted audience, data collection, doing business correspondence

Content Writing

Writing SEO oriented content, creating, planning, and uploading posts for websites and different social media

Simple process of hiring Dedicated Employees

Brief Us

Let's jump on a call to understand your needs and offer you the best solution

Choose a candidate

We send you resumes of the candidates that might suit your requirements

Hold an interview

Interview selected candidates via Skype or video conference.
Give them a short test if needed

Ready to go

Let's discuss the start date, workflow and sign the service agreement
